description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Excruciating Guitar Voyage is a platform-puzzle-adventure. You play as PX, a surprisingly invincible hairy moron, who can set himself on fire and electrocute himself to solve puzzles. EGV combines traditional point'n'click style puzzles with platform gameplay. There is a fully voiced cast of interesting characters to meet, bizarre scenarios to end up in, and many many levers to pull.
